verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Like a candle flame,
flickering small in our darkness.
uncreated light
shines through infant eyes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Stars and angels sing,
yet the earth sleeps in the shadows;
can this tiny spark
set a world on fire?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yet His light shall shine
from our lives, Spirit blazing,
as we touch the flame
Of His holy fire.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
God is with us, alleluia. (Men)
God is with us, alleluia. (Women)
come to save us, alleluia. (Men)
come to save us, (Women)
Alleluia! (All).
